metadata.name: Slotie Junior #1
metadata.description:
Slotie Juniors are the next generation of NFTs in the most anticipated blockchain gambling network of Sloties. Only 5,000 Juniors will ever be mintable with the remaining 5,000 Juniors reserved for Slotie Holders to breed, making 10,000 unique artworks that grant proof of ownership based on the ERC-721 standard.

Slotie Juniors grant access to the Las Vegas of the metaverse, SlotieVerse. SlotieVerse is a decentralized VR platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain and aims to create unmatched social experiences with the mission to have entertaining events in every corner.

The owner of a Slotie Junior NFT will receive the following benefits:

One plot of land per Slotie Junior held

Receive 100% of the rewards from the Slotie Junior District in SlotieVerse.

Wall of Owners in SlotieVerse to forever honor the original Slotie community.

Exclusive Holder Rewards from our partner casino network.
